mapper.sql: sensitive_id, sensitive_word, replace_word, create_time, update_time, oper_id
mapper.select:
select
from jc_sensitive_word where 1=1
and ( sensitive_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') or sensitive_word LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') or replace_word LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') or oper_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') )
mapper.update:
update jc_sensitive_word
sensitive_word = #{sensitiveWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
replace_word = #{replaceWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
oper_id = #{operId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sensitive_id = #{sensitiveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
